subject: Final Divert Funds AS YOU ARE
body:
Final Divert Funds AS YOU ARE DEAD I told you to pay $150 usd before to you received your $11.7Million, but Right now i will help you with $100, so right now 
if you sure that you are alive then,try your possible best to get the remain balance of $50 and send it today.
I give you today to send the remaining balance of $50 if you are ready and you are alive.because after today this Man MR JOE BEN, who told this office that you are dead will pay the fee to clam this your funds $11.7Million. 
Use the $50 to buy an Ebay card or steam card or iTunes card.
Contact with your full Information Below.
Full Name:::

thank you
Mr. Ban Kelly

subject: Re: Final Divert Funds AS YOU ARE
body:
Hello Mr. Ban Kelly,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well. I received your message regarding the final divert funds, but I must admit that I am a bit confused about the details.

Could you please provide me with more information about the funds and why they need to be diverted? Also, who is this person MR JOE BEN and how are they involved in this matter?

Additionally, I would appreciate it if you could clarify what you mean by using the funds to buy an Ebay card or steam card or card. How does that relate to the situation at hand?

I look forward to hearing back from you with more information. Thank you.

Best wishes,
Cassie
